name: Heart Bound
description:
Instructions and Controls:

Movement: WASD

Aim: Mouse move

Shoot: LMB

Pause: Esc

Protect your village. Shooting lowers your health. Pick up your arrows from the ground to regain health. If you lose all your health you won't have any arrows to shoot.

Background Info:

Robby was the protector of the Three Sacred Villages. One day he was shot in the heart with an arrow and is now forever bound to it.
